explanation: The page provides information on the mandatory learning and support systems "Mindsteps" and "Lernpass plus" for public primary schools.
The page describes "eBau", an electronic building permit procedure aimed at handling building permit processes electronically in the Canton of Schwyz.
The page provides guidance for switching from the desktop version to the online tax declaration solution and includes technical and subject-specific FAQs.

The page details the "eTax.SZ" software, which offers an online solution for natural persons to create and submit up to 20 tax declarations digitally, as well as a desktop application for creating an unlimited number of tax declarations.
